name: Reprise Media
description:
Reprise is focused on customer intent. We understand, activate, and optimize what consumers seek, share, and create. Our diverse team of specialists are experts in search engine marketing (SEM), search engine optimization (SEO), social media optimization (SMO), and content creation to help the world's top enterprises achieve their business goals.
As a subsidiary of the Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) and part of Mediabrands, Reprise is headquartered in New York with over 40 offices around the world.
